title: EU eyes ring-fencing public subsidies for European tech
summary_full: A draft of the Industrial Accelerator Act, obtained by Euractiv, seeks to funnel public support to homegrown companies in tech sectors including AI, chips and space
summary_public: A draft of the Industrial Accelerator Act, obtained by Euractiv, seeks to funnel public support to homegrown companies in tech sectors including AI, chips and space
